name: Itty Bitty Midi Committee Serum Trio
about: What it is:A limited-edition skincare kit with a complete set of serums to leave your skin hydrated, smooth, and downright glowingu2014welcome to the committee..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Pores, Dryness, Dullness, Uneven Texture, Loss of Firmness and Elasticity, and Oiliness.Highlighted Ingredients:- Sodium Hyaluronate: With a smaller molecular weight than hyaluronic acid it penetrates and delivers intense hydration to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles and promote visible firmness..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:The skin is an acidic environment, which means it recognizesu2014and lovesu2014acids. C-Firma Fresh visibly brightens and firms with 15% l-ascorbic acid (vitamin C); B-Hydra hydrates with sodium hyaluronate, a smaller derivative of hyaluronic acid; and T.L.C. Framboos exfoliates with 10% AHAs and 1% BHA..This Set Contains:- 0.5 oz/ 15 mL C-Firma Fresh Day Serum.Clinical Results:C-Firma Fresh Day Serum:
ingredients: -Sodium Hyaluronate: With a smaller molecular weight than hyaluronic acid it penetrates and delivers intense hydration to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles and promote visible firmness. .-L-Ascorbic Acid: Improves fine lines, wrinkles, and hyperpigmentation and visibly brighten skin. .-T.L.C. Framboos AHA Blend: Resurfaces and exfoliates skin for a smoother, more even-looking complexion...C-Firma Fresh Day Serum:.Water/Aqua/Eau, Dimethyl Isosorbide, Ascorbic Acid, Laureth-23, Glycerin, Tocopherol, Lactobacillus/Pumpkin Ferment Extract, Sclerocarya Birrea Seed Oil, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Juice Extract, Ferulic Acid, Phyllanthus Emblica Fruit Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Lactobacillus/Punica Granatum Fruit Ferment Extract, Propanediol, Gluconolactone, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Sodium Hyaluronate, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Extract, Glutamylamidoethyl Imidazole, Tetrahydrobisdemethoxydiferuloylmethane, Tetrahydrodemethoxydiferuloylmethane, Tetrahydrodiferuloylmethane, Pentylene Glycol, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Sorbic Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Benzoate, Caprylyl Glycol, Chondrus Crispus (Carrageenan) Extract, Ethylhexylglycerin...B-Hydra Intensive Hydration Serum:.Water, Coconut Alkanes, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/VP Copolymer, Glycerin, Pentylene Glycol, Sclerocarya Birrea Seed Oil, Wheat Amino Acids, Ananas Sativus (Pineapple) Fruit Extract, Berberis Vulgaris Root Extract, Citrullus Lanatus (Watermelon) Fruit Extract, Lens Esculenta (Lentil) Fruit Extract, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Panthenol, Sodium PCA, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Niacinamide, Cyclodextrin, Sodium Hyaluronate, Sodium Lactate, Phenoxyethanol, Hydroxyproline, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Citric Acid, Caprylyl Glycol, Chlorphenesin, Ethylhexylglycerin...T.L.C. Framboos Glycolic Resurfacing Night Serum:.Water, Glycolic Acid, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Sodium Hydroxide, Salicylic Acid, Lactic Acid, Citric Acid, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Juice Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Opuntia Ficus-Indica Extract, Aesculus Hippocastanum (Horse Chestnut) Seed Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Rubus Idaeus (Raspberry) Fruit Extract, Saccharomyces Cerevisiae Extract, Buddleja Davidii Meristem Cell Culture, Sclerocarya Birrea Seed Oil, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Allantoin, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Galactoarabinan, Propanediol, Disodium EDTA, Xanthan Gum, Hexylene Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Nitrate, Potassium Sorbate, Pentylene Glycol, Sodium Benzoate...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.All Drunk Elephant products are biocompatible with skin and silicone-free, which means our serums are super absorbable and can be mixed with any other Drunk Elephant serum or moisturizer into what we call a skincare smoothie:..In the Morning:.-Mix one pump of C-Firma Fresh with one pump of B-Hydra and apply to a clean, dry face. .-Follow with a broad-spectrum sunscreen. ..In the evening:. -Mix one pump of T.L.C. Framboos with one pump of B-Hydra and apply to a clean, dry face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first time trying Drunk Elephant products and I am very happy with this purchase. The products are a nice size to start out with; not too small. My skin has noticeably improved in texture and redness and two stubborn blemishes I did have are quickly going away after only two days of use. My skin is also very soft, something that never happens regardless of the moisturizer I use. The C Firma needs to be mixed before first use, but this is quite easy to do if you follow the instructions on the side of the bottle. When you first open the package it looks like the top of the C-Firma bottle is unattached. Don't freak out, it's not broken! Follow the instructions to mix the product and before trying to reattach the top portion, be sure to remove the thin cardboard strip at the top of the base. I almost missed this, but quickly realized this is what was keeping the top from clicking into place. Once removed, you should be good.  To use the product, turn the top counter-clockwise and the pump will pop up. Turn it clockwise to close it. While it did not happen to me as I'm used to using these types of ingredients, these products may make you break out more at first because it's purging the skin. It will get better, but it has to get worse first. Be patient and enjoy. This is a real review and not incentivized.

Don't buy this product. I spent way too much time trying to reassemble the C-Firma Day Serum bottle. I don't care if it is because the product is so fresh that you have to mix it yourself. I don't pay this much for a product to have horrible cheap packaging.

reviews.review_title: Tried this instead of Sunday Riley
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019d never tried their stuff before, I use Sunday Riley primarily and wanted to give it a go. Sunday is definitely more hydrating.  u2022 This vit c smells like bananas and is a bit sticky and drippy, I didnu2019t notice any like u201cwow Iu2019m glowingu201d u2022  I really like the serum texture of the b hydra but I honestly havenu2019t noticed any difference in the level of hydration in my face. Still feel kinda dry under there.  u2022 The framboos is very nice as my skin is super smooth and I donu2019t have those small white bumps under my skin that used to plague me. Nice gel texture too.  It was fun to get this kit and try it out but SR kits are a better price point and feel more hydrating for me personally.

reviews.review_title: Way too much for my face
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was really excited about this kit, I wanted to try the serums without committing to the full size. However, after using all three after a few days as instructed, my face exploded in breakouts. When I stopped my skin returned to normal. If you have sensitive skin Iu2019d reconsider

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great products and fun sizes.   They seem small but contain a decent amount of product to properly test out or expand your skin collection

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great product. Super happy with my purchase. Itu2019s just the right amount of product and I donu2019t have to worry about any of them expiring before I get to finish them all. Plus the packaging is super cute!! It would be closer to $300 to buy all these products in there smallest available purchase sizes! I had some irritation on my cheeks during the first couple of uses but it has since calmed down and my face is back to being smooth, and hydrated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is an amazing set for the price with a really great amount of product! The orange is my forever favorite followed by the blue and then pink!
Would not recommend these. All three leave me skin incredibly sticky. For the price point, there are so many better options.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, notSure skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: really good products!! got for my bday, love the b-hydra serum. night serum is sticky good as primer. super cute packaging.

reviews.review_title: All the best serums in one!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: These are very good products, especially the b-hydra serum!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Donu2019t be fooled by the cute packaging. I tried this set as Iu2019m in the hunt for new skin care. Well, itu2019s not worth it. The vitamin C serum left my skin very sticky! I hated how it felt. My skin is sensitive and this set only irritated it.

reviews.review_title: Perfect way to try their best 3 serums!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Such an awesome set! Instead of having to buy each full size I can now just buy this set! And on top of that you save $20 bc of value!! Best vitamin C ever, b hydra is my all time fave and the night serum is so good for my blackheads!!
